content:
Based on the hypothesis that residual EDTA from the wash buffer chelates the essential CoCl2 cofactor for the TdT enzyme, here is the optimizing advice:

Modify the recipe for the 1X Binding & Washing (B&W) Buffer used in Steps 1.2.2 and 1.4.2 by omitting the 0.5 mM EDTA component.
 The optimizing hypothesis is saved to file: Hypothesis-8485
 Rolled back to procedure ID: Protocol-b5fc
